messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] HI I AM NEW HERE!!!ew with quick question.
messages.msgSnippet: HI..I am new here...I live in Ontario Canada..I am teaching my children at home..I was born in Chile ..my first language is spanish..and this is the reason I
messages.messageBody:
HI..I am new here...I live in Ontario Canada..I am teaching my children at
home..I was born in Chile ..my first language is spanish..and this is the
reason I write with an accent je je..

My DD is 12 and DS is 20..he is working with his father since he is 16..he
is doing great and now he is building is own home here in our farm...my DD
is very indepent..and never been to school..she is bright..and quick to
learn what she likes...
We have a farm and animals and we do a big vegetable garden in the summer
and we do canning..

For the friend that is asking about horses...what she can do is find a local
horse farm or a farm that they have horses..and ask them..if you girls can
go there to help once a week and if they can ride the horse once a week..
farmer love free help and will be happy to teach to girls how to ride and
learn the horses...don't take them to ridden lesson...I think is a waste of
money...I took my DD and she did like it..because it wasn't what he was
looking for..
Have a great day..
Today we are going the the livestock market
Ally
